components.label: Relevant experience on your primary skill

data.custom: const bands=[{label:'0-2 years',value:'0-2',max:2},{label:'3-5 years',value:'3-5',max:5},{label:'6-9 years',value:'6-9',max:9},{label:'10+ years',value:'10+',max:Infinity}]; const map={'0-2':2,'3-5':5,'6-9':9,'10+':Infinity}; const selected=data && data.yearsBand; const maxAllowed=Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(map, selected)?map[selected]:Infinity; return bands.filter(b=>b.max<=maxAllowed).map(({label,value})=>({label,value}));
